Reviews.Title: “Not bad, good value”
Reviews.Author: Christina T
Reviews.Content: bearing mind staying istanbul august hotel value 55 euros triple breakfast location main tourist drag sultanahmet near fish restaurants bedrooms sleep bathroom clean serviceable shower breakfast roof terrace lovely air conditioning unit completely inadequate advise breakfast hot outside visiting summer lovely views breakfast terrace breakfast ok average turkish breakfast eggs hardboiled black avoided staff ok particularly friendly return particularly rate

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and friendly, but a little cramped”

Reviews.Content: location 10 minute stroll hill grand bazaar rooftop breakfast separate bar lounge hotel bit ramshackle thats istanbul sort adds charm serviceable comfortable crowd annoying single lift services hotel mid market tourists suitable business travelers
